      • updateInventoryCount

        public int updateInventoryCount​(java.lang.String inventoryId,
                                int difference)
                         throws StoreException
        This makes sure the overall inventory map for all stores as well as the inventory in a particular shelf is updated. The same inventory(same inventory id) can be split between stores so the count for a particular shelf maybe different from the overall inventory count
        Specified by:
        updateInventoryCount in interface IStoreModelService
        Parameters:
        inventoryId -
        difference -
        Returns:
        inventory count
        Throws:
        StoreException

      • removeItemFromBasket

        public Basket removeItemFromBasket​(java.lang.String basketId,
                                   java.lang.String productId,
                                   int countReturned)
                            throws StoreException
        The same logic as adding. Inventory with updated count replaces existing. The basket also reflected a decreased count if there are remaining items with the same product id, it gets completely removed from the basket if there are not.
        Specified by:
        removeItemFromBasket in interface IStoreModelService

        basketId -
